channel.title: Jay Greguske's Website
channel.description: Recent content on Jay Greguske's Website

item.title: About Me
item.description: All opinons here are my own, not my employer or any other organization cited here. Career I started with a 2 year stint at HP as a software developer, got laid off, and have worked at Red Hat, Inc. ever since. It’s been good, I’m not actively looking for a new job. IBM continues to behave like an ally too, which is encouraging. It’s been about 11 years now; the first few years I was a release engineer, eventually became a technical lead for the team, then the lead for a team of teams.
